mutants.code:
def calculate_max_sum(n, m, a, b):
    combined = a - b[:-1]
    combined_sorted = sorted(combined, reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(combined_sorted[:n - 1]) + b[-1]
    return max_sum

def calculate_max_sum(n, m, a, b):
    combined = a * b[:-1]
    combined_sorted = sorted(combined, reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(combined_sorted[:n - 1]) + b[-1]
    return max_sum

def calculate_max_sum(n, m, a, b):
    combined = a + b[:-1]
    combined_sorted = sorted(combined, reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(combined_sorted[:n - 1]) - b[-1]
    return max_sum
